bug.author: chenhuims
bug.summary: [BUG] tensorboard path in Dilated CNN example
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
In the example, the tensorboard binary path is retrieved by running "which tensorboard". But this command is not supported in Windows. Instead "where tensorboard" should be used for Windows. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
